concept.cypher: MATCH (methodDeclaration:MethodDeclaration)-[:HAS_METHOD_HEADER]-> ()-[:HAS_METHOD_DECLARATOR]-> ()-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]->(identifier:TerminalNodeStrings) OPTIONAL MATCH (methodDeclaration:MethodDeclaration)-[:HAS_METHOD_MODIFIER]-> ()-[:HAS_VISIBILITY_MODIFIER]-> (visibilityModifier:VisibilityModifier) MERGE (method:Java:Language:Method { fqn: 'package.fqn' + '.' + identifier.text, name: identifier.text, visibility: visibilityModifier.sourceCode }) MERGE (method)-[:DEFINED_BY]->(methodDeclaration) RETURN *
